Test Case: Verify admin can create new custom role
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Go to Admin Roles page
3. Click Create New Role
4. Enter role name and description
5. Select permissions
6. Click Save
Expected Result: New role created and appears in roles list

Test Case: Verify role name is required
Test Steps:
1. Go to create role page
2. Leave name field empty
3. Click Save

Test Case: Verify duplicate role names rejected
Test Steps:
1. Go to create role page
2. Enter 'Support Staff' as name
3. Click Save

Test Case: Verify slug auto-generated from name
Test Steps:
1. Go to create role page
2. Enter 'Finance Manager' as name
3. Save role

Test Case: Verify admin can edit existing role
Test Steps:
1. Go to roles list
2. Click Edit on a role
3. Change name/description
4. Update permissions
5. Save

Test Case: Verify system roles can be edited
Pre-conditions: Admin with roles.manage permission and system role exists
Test Steps:
1. Go to roles list
2. Click Edit on system role (e.g., Support Staff)
3. Modify permissions
4. Save

Test Case: Verify custom roles can be deleted
Pre-conditions: Custom role with no assigned users
Test Steps:
1. Go to roles list
2. Click Delete on custom role
3. Confirm deletion

Test Case: Verify system roles cannot be deleted
Test Steps:
1. Go to roles list
2. Attempt to delete system role
Expected Result: Delete action blocked or error: Cannot delete system role

Test Case: Verify roles with assigned users cannot be deleted
Test Steps:
1. Go to roles list
2. Try to delete role with users
3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Error: Cannot delete role with assigned users

Test Case: Verify admin can view role details
Test Steps:
1. Go to roles list
2. Click on role name to view
Expected Result: Role details page shows name description and permissions

Test Case: Verify admin without roles.view cannot access roles page
Test Steps:
1. Login as limited admin
2. Try to navigate to /admin/roles

Test Case: Verify permissions can be added to role
Test Steps:
1. Edit existing role
2. Check additional permission checkboxes
3. Save

Test Case: Verify permissions can be removed from role
Test Steps:
1. Edit role
2. Uncheck permission checkboxes
3. Save

Test Case: Verify permissions grouped by module in UI
Test Steps:
1. Go to create/edit role page
2. View permissions section
Expected Result: Permissions organized by module (Dashboard Analytics Users etc)

Test Case: Verify select all permissions for module works
Test Steps:
1. Go to edit role page
2. Click Select All for a module
Expected Result: All permissions in that module selected

Test Case: Verify admin can assign role to user
Pre-conditions: Admin with roles.manage permission and regular user exists
Test Steps:
1. Go to Staff Management
2. Search for user
3. Select admin role from dropdown
4. Save
Expected Result: User assigned admin role and gains admin access

Test Case: Verify admin can change user's role
Test Steps:
1. Go to Staff Management
2. Find staff member
3. Change role to different one
4. Save
Expected Result: User's role changed and permissions updated

Test Case: Verify admin can demote staff to regular user
Test Steps:
1. Go to Staff Management
2. Find staff member
3. Click Demote/Remove Role
4. Confirm
Expected Result: User loses admin access and becomes regular user

Test Case: Verify admin can view staff list
Test Steps:
1. Go to Staff Management page
2. View list
Expected Result: All users with admin roles displayed

Test Case: Verify admin can search staff members
Test Steps:
1. Go to Staff Management
2. Enter search term
3. Search

Test Case: Verify Super Admin can access all features
Test Steps:
1. Login as Super Admin
2. Navigate to every admin section
3. Perform actions in each

Test Case: Verify Super Admin bypasses permission checks
Test Steps:
1. Login as Super Admin
2. Access feature that requires specific permission
3. Perform restricted action
Expected Result: Action allowed regardless of explicit permissions

Test Case: Verify Super Admin role cannot be changed by other admins
Pre-conditions: Super Admin user and another admin
Test Steps:
1. Login as non-Super Admin
2. Try to change Super Admin's role
Expected Result: Action blocked or option not available

Test Case: Verify permission changes apply immediately
Test Steps:

2. Super Admin removes a permission from their role
3. Staff refreshes page

Test Case: Verify role changes apply immediately

2. Super Admin changes their role to limited one
3. Staff refreshes page

Test Case: Verify access granted if ANY permission matches
Pre-conditions: Staff with users.view but checking users.view OR users.edit
Test Steps:
1. Route requires either users.view OR users.edit
2. Staff has only users.view
3. Access route

Test Case: Verify access denied if missing any required
Pre-conditions: Staff with only users.view when route needs users.view AND users.edit
Test Steps:
1. Route requires both permissions
2. Staff has only one
3. Access route

Test Case: Verify role with no permissions blocks all features
Pre-conditions: Role created with no permissions selected
Test Steps:
1. Assign user to empty-permission role
2. User tries to access any admin feature
Expected Result: Access denied to all features except basic admin

Test Case: Verify role with all permissions grants full access
Pre-conditions: Custom role with every permission checked
Test Steps:
1. Assign user to full-permission role
2. Access all features

Test Case: Verify admin cannot remove their own admin access
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Try to remove own admin role

Test Case: Verify cannot demote last Super Admin
Test Steps:
1. Try to change last Super Admin's role
2. Or try to deactivate Super Admin role
Expected Result: Action blocked - must maintain at least one Super Admin

Test Case: Verify action buttons hidden without permission
Test Steps:
1. Login as view-only staff
2. View any list page
Expected Result: Edit Delete Create buttons not visible

Test Case: Verify forms read-only without edit permission
Pre-conditions: Staff with view but not edit permissions
Test Steps:
1. Login as view-only staff
2. Access detail page
Expected Result: Form fields are read-only or edit not accessible

Test Case: Verify bulk actions hidden without permission
Test Steps:
1. Login as limited staff
2. View list with bulk actions
Expected Result: Bulk action checkboxes and buttons hidden

Test Case: Verify API endpoints respect permissions
Pre-conditions: Staff without users.view making API call
Test Steps:
1. Login as limited staff
2. Call /admin/users/api/list via AJAX

Pre-conditions: Staff without users.edit triggering AJAX edit
Test Steps:
1. Login as limited staff
2. Manipulate DOM to show edit button
3. Click edit (AJAX call)
